alert.note: Alert for Central Tularosa Basin; Eastern Black Range Foothills; Lowlands of the Bootheel; Northern Dona Ana County; Otero Mesa; Sierra County Lakes; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southern Tularosa Basin; Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 22 at 1:53AM MST until February 22 at 8:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. Higher gusts possible in the mountains. * WHERE...In New Mexico, Dona Ana, Sierra, Luna, Grant, Hidalgo, and Otero Counties. In Texas, El Paso and Hudspeth Counties. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 8 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Local power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will peak during the early afternoon hours on Wednesday. Areas of blowing dust will be possible, leading to lower visibility.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
